page.title: 05The Arena Sports Centre
page.content:
In Camberley you can always find something to do from swimming to going to the cinema. Quite a lot of the facilities are well used, for example, the new{sports centre}- the Arena - where you can go to swim, roller skate, play badminton and squash or to use the gym.
Beside the sports centre is a{large {park}with an all-weather pitch for football, rugby, hockey, and cricket.
Benches are situated around the park for spectators. If the children get bored whilst their parents are watching the sport they can spend their time in the children's play area. In another part of the park there are four tennis courts and a nine hole putting green.
